pages.title: Casting
pages.text: $(br)Casting is a mage's bread and butter. You must hold a $(key)casting item$() to cast spells. Common $(key)casting items$() include $(bold)wands, staves, swords, and some other weapons$().$(br2)Which spells you can cast depends on your $(key)spell pool$(). Your $(key)spell pool$() is determined by the item in your hand and the $(mage/book)spell book$() you have equipped.
